experience.title: Data Analyst II - Analytics Development Program (ADP)
Data Scientist
experience.description: - Applied BERT, RoBERTa, GPT based training and translated natural language text to SQL query- Solved deduplication problem over millions of record using RecordLinkage approach- Worked on Attribution model with rule based approach, Markov chain and neural network architecture.- Successfully deployed ML model and created several API using Flaskapp and docker service
experience.description_html: - Applied BERT, RoBERTa, GPT based training and translated natural language text to SQL query- Solved deduplication problem over millions of record using RecordLinkage approach- Worked on Attribution model with rule based approach, Markov chain and neural network architecture.- Successfully deployed ML model and created several API using Flaskapp and docker service <!---->

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: - Built a Custom trained NER Model to correctly identify the key entities like Name, property address, in the land records for the Karnataka state- Scraped the Data from the PDS portal, annotated the data to optimize the performance of the NER Model, used this data as input to the NER Model - Worked on image processing, extracted text data from images using OCR, OpenCV and analyzed using NLP - Worked on document classification to classify different type of document such as PAN, Aadhar Card
experience.description_html: - Built a Custom trained NER Model to correctly identify the key entities like Name, property address, in the land records for the Karnataka state- Scraped the Data from the PDS portal, annotated the data to optimize the performance of the NER Model, used this data as input to the NER Model - Worked on image processing, extracted text data from images using OCR, OpenCV and analyzed using NLP - Worked on document classification to classify different type of document such as PAN, Aadhar Card

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: - Automation of the whole Marketing costing report of Fabhotels in python, earlier it is done manually.- Web Scraping of five different booking source of FabHotels using Selenium in Python language.- Preprocess raw data from various sources into a structured format and updating the same in the database.- Also, implemented a live update system on a PostgreSQL Server to report daily changes in the data using a python backend.
experience.description_html: - Automation of the whole Marketing costing report of Fabhotels in python, earlier it is done manually.- Web Scraping of five different booking source of FabHotels using Selenium in Python language.- Preprocess raw data from various sources into a structured format and updating the same in the database.- Also, implemented a live update system on a PostgreSQL Server to report daily changes in the data using a python backend. <!---->

projects: [{"title":"B.Tech Project | Development of IOT Based Smart Personal Protective Equipment (Safety Jacket)","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"• Made a prototype of IoT(Internet Of Things) based Smart Safety Jacket for the safety of Industrial workers.• Embedded following Sensors/Module: •GPS module: To know the exact location of workers. •MQ9 Gas sensor: For the detection of harmful gases like CO, CH4. •DHT22: For measurement of body temperature as well as Surrounding temperature. •Pulse sensor: To measure the Pulse Rate in BPM to know the fatigue level. •Arduino UNO and NodeMCU(ESP8266).• Set the proper threshold value for each parameter. Thus Alarm will buzz whenever this threshold value will cross. Thus accidents can be stopped beforehand.• Written the code in Arduino IDE."},{"title":"Classification on Audiology Dataset","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"• Built decision tree classifier model based on the C4.5 algorithm.• Reported performance measure in terms of Confusion Matrix, Predictive Accuracy, F-1 score.• Used K-Fold Cross Validation with a different value of K.• Obtained ROC Curve with the different values of K."},{"title":"Demand Forecasting of Tea Price","start_date":"Aug 2018","end_date":"Oct 2018","description":"•Time Series data collected of tea price.•Data Cleaned and Manipulated in python to extract only for 2013 to the 2016 year.•Forecasting is done for the next 6 months using ARIMA Model."},{"title":"Simulation and analysis of RRI(Route Relay Interlocking) system","start_date":"Jan 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"•Simulation and analysis of the RRI system of Kharagpur Junction aimed at the reduction of total wait time of trains."}]
